q: `` We had been telling her that she was inspiring the country with her courage and that we couldn't wait to take her out to pizza and a weekend away,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said through a spokeswoman. Then, after she heard our voices and the encouragement of Mark and her parents, she struggled briefly and opened her eyes for the very first time. It was a miracle to witness. `` My heart was overflowing with love for my friend Gabrielle Giffords today,'' Debbie Wasserman Schultz said in a prepared statement.`` It was absolutely incredible to witness Gabrielle Giffords open her eyes. The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety and others have questioned whetherbanning texting behind the wheel orusing a hand-held cell phone reduces traffic accidents. Ray LaHood responded Thursday by saying, there are some who would like to derail our work spotlighting the dangers of texting or talking on the phone while driving. I want them to know that our fight to end distracted driving will not be deterred. Ray LaHood has been on a self-described`` rampage'' on the issue in the wake of harrowing stories of motorists killed by drivers who were texting or talking on a phone.
